## Introduction
Game of Thrones Wikipedia Views Data

Read Data
```{r}
got <- read.csv("data_input/wiki_got_views.csv")
str(got)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
got <- got %>% 
  mutate(ds = as.Date(date), y = views) %>% 
  select(ds, y)
```

```{r}
library(prophet)
got_model <- prophet(got)
```

```{r}
got_fd <- make_future_dataframe(got_model, periods = 365)
tail(got_fd)
```

```{r}
got_fc <- predict(got_model, got_fd)
str(got_fc)
```

```{r}
actual_pred <- cbind(got, got_fc[1:nrow(got), c("yhat_lower", "yhat", "yhat_upper")])
head(actual_pred)
```

```{r}
plot(got_model, got_fc)
```

```{r}
prophet_plot_components(got_model, got_fc)
```
